Description: CAREFULLY READ ITEM DESCRIPTION AND THE TERMS OF SALE. Thanks! ITEM DESCRIPTION: Oh, you know what this is, and just what it is capable of doing for your sound and to the world. So if you need a fully functional butt-kicking machine with which to rule the universe, then grab this and get the fu*k on with world domination! The unit has the obligatory rack rash but nevertheless does what it is supposed to do like an atomic bomb.This unit is a Series 2 Triaxis from the serial number range of 7000. This is where the heavy bands of the 1980's and 1990's got their HEAVINESS! Unit will be boxed up tight to insure safe transit during shipping. Thanks for stopping by! TERMS BIDDING AND SHIPPING ARE TO CONFIRMED EBAY MEMBERS ONLY. WE SHIP ALL OVER THE WORLD. DOMESTIC BUYERS IN THE UNITED STATES AND INTERNATIONAL BUYERS MUST HAVE CONFIRMED PAYPAL ACCOUNTS. Shipping within the lower 48 (the Continental United State) ship via UPS or FedEx Ground. Buyers in Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico, please make contact for a shipping quote. ALL international shipments ship via USPS EMS International Express. ALL shipments are fully insured and require signature when delivered. INTERNATIONAL BUYERS need to make contact for shipping price quote (as shipping will be different from country to country). All shipments MUST be delivered to the buyer's confirmed Ebay/Paypal physical address (no PO Boxes or AFO/FPO deliveries). We cannot release shipments to any alternative address. Any attempt to reroute a shipment will trigger the item's interception and return, and a 20% service/restocking fee will be assessed at time of refund. For both our safety and your peace of mind, there is no exception to these buying/shipping terms.RETURNS: ALL International Shipments are nonreturnable; PERIOD!Return shipping is the obligation of buyer, not seller. Thanks! ROCK HARD, ROCK STEADY, ROCK FRICKIN' ON!
Title: Mesa Boogie TriAxis Preamp Series 2 late production run unit!
ConditionDescription: Here is a Mesa Boogie Triaxis guitar preamplifier, Series 2. This preamp shows typical signs of previous racking and use, is fully operational, and ROCKS!.
